ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: One of the most intense and rewarding learning experiences you will ever have. Do it.
A class on conceptions of cinema until 1920. If students were interested in the material I would recommend it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It is absolutely essential to understanding film. My research and understanding of film studies has been profoundly enriched by this class.

This class provides a great basis for what "cinema" was defined as. That said I wish there was more pedagogy related to research and "methods" of writing/reading working with archives and early cinema.
